aircraft.value: Hercules Transport - AC-3653-720 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Ammunition feed jam. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 30/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 02/05/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 05/05/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 03/05/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 06/05/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Ammunition feed jam. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
